attributes.action: Get interpreter work full time at Dumfries and Galloway
attributes.additional_details: Been put on standard papers and contacting to Scottish government and unionist Scotland interpreter and others company in Scotland and all deaf Community fighting to Dumfries council to make it full time interpreter not part time its unfair for SLI from Glasgow and Edinburgh have to drive 2 hours. What if it emergency and hard to find the signer and no one available. It ridiculous. Please sign it petition make Dumfries council wake up because they cant see who deaf.
attributes.background: Dumfries council lack of support and funding problem with no signer and they giving job descriptions for part time we dont want part time signer we want full time signer work in Dumfries and Galloway because there approx 600 deaf people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of Dumfries and Galloway Council and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. 

You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 

You could also start a petition to the Scottish Parliament here:

https://www.parliament.scot/gettinginvolved/petitions/
